properties.description: Load Data From Blob To Synapse SQL Pool

source:
%%pyspark
# Imporing the libraries
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.functions import lit,col,sum,mean,regexp_replace,to_date,count,row_number
from pyspark.sql.types import DateType
from pyspark.sql.window import Window

# Creating a spark session and connection to blob storage account
blob_account_name = "rawdevstorage"
blob_container_name = "output"
sc = SparkSession.builder.getOrCreate()
token_library = sc._jvm.com.microsoft.azure.synapse.tokenlibrary.TokenLibrary
blob_sas_token = token_library.getConnectionString("cmdevsynapse-WorkspaceDefaultStorage")
spark.conf.set(
    'fs.azure.sas.%s.%s.blob.core.windows.net' % (blob_container_name, blob_account_name),
    blob_sas_token)

# Define the path to the Delta table
delta_table_path = 'abfss://output@rawdevstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Electricity_Measurement_pyspark_join'

# Read Delta table into a DataFrame
reference_table = spark.read.format("delta").load(delta_table_path)
# Show the contents of the DataFrame

# Creating a group by for Markt dimension
grouped_reference_table_markt_dimension = reference_table.groupBy("DM_Markt")
markt_dimension = grouped_reference_table_markt_dimension.agg(count("DM_Trekkingsdatum"))

grouped_reference_table_date_dimension_1 = reference_table.groupBy("DM_Trekkingsdatum")
date_dimension_1 = grouped_reference_table_date_dimension_1.agg(count("DM_Trekkingsdatum"))

grouped_reference_table_date_dimension_2 = reference_table.groupBy("DM_Peildatum")
date_dimension_2 = grouped_reference_table_date_dimension_2.agg(count("DM_Trekkingsdatum"))

# Exclude the undefined/null value
markt_dimension = markt_dimension.filter(col("DM_Markt").isNotNull())
date_dimension_1 = date_dimension_1.filter(col("DM_Trekkingsdatum").isNotNull())
date_dimension_2 = date_dimension_2.filter(col("DM_Peildatum").isNotNull())

# Rename columns
markt_dimension = markt_dimension.withColumnRenamed("DM_Markt", "Markt_Name") \
.withColumnRenamed("count(DM_Trekkingsdatum)", "count")

date_dimension_1 = date_dimension_1.withColumnRenamed("DM_Trekkingsdatum", "Date") \
.withColumnRenamed("count(DM_Trekkingsdatum)", "count")

date_dimension_2 = date_dimension_2.withColumnRenamed("DM_Peildatum", "Date") \
.withColumnRenamed("count(DM_Trekkingsdatum)", "count")

# Selecting specific columns
date_dimension_1 =date_dimension_1.select("Date")
date_dimension_2 =date_dimension_2.select("Date")


# Unioning the date dimension and removing the duplicates
date_dimension = date_dimension_1.union(date_dimension_2).distinct()

# Define the window specification for the grouping
markt_dimension_window_spec = Window.orderBy(markt_dimension["Markt_Name"].desc()) #Window.partitionBy("DM_Markt").orderBy("DM_Markt")
date_dimension_window_spec = Window.orderBy(date_dimension["Date"].desc())

# Add an auto-incrementing column to the DataFrame within the group
markt_dimension = markt_dimension.withColumn("Markt_ID", row_number().over(markt_dimension_window_spec))
date_dimension = date_dimension.withColumn("Date_ID", row_number().over(date_dimension_window_spec))

# Selecting specific columns and Rearranging the columns
markt_dimension =markt_dimension.select("Markt_ID", "Markt_Name")

# Displaying the Markt markt_dimension
display(markt_dimension)

# Writing the markt dimension to delta file
file_path = 'abfss://goldlayer@rawdevstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/PySparkDimensions/Markt_Dimension'
write_format="delta"
#partition_by=["DM_Peildatum"]
mode_ = "overwrite" #append

markt_dimension\
.write\
.option("header", "true")\
.option("overwriteSchema", "true")\
.format(write_format)\
.mode(mode_)\
.save(file_path)

#.partitionBy(partition_by)\

# Creating a Group By to check the counts based on month, market and postal code
from pyspark.sql.functions import count
grouped_data1 = selected_df1.groupBy('Peildatum', 'Markt', 'Leveringsadres_Postcode')
grouped_data2 = selected_df2.groupBy('Peildatum', 'Markt', 'Leveringsadres_Postcode')
count_group_by1 = grouped_data1.agg(count("WerkelijkVerbruik_RM_2017"))
count_group_by1.show() #Analogue Reading Group BY
count_group_by2 = grouped_data2.agg(count("WerkelijkVerbruik_RM_2017"))
count_group_by2.show() #Digital Reading Group By
# Doing union operation to get a single dataframe combining Analogue and Digital measurement data

# Displaying the top 5 rows
display(df.limit(5))

# Checking the datatypes of the column
df.dtypes

file_path = 'abfss://output@rawdevstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Electricity_Measurement_pyspark_union'
write_format="delta"
partition_by=["Peildatum"]
mode_ = Mode #overwrite #append

df\
.write\
.option("header", "true")\
.option("overwriteSchema", "true")\
.format(write_format)\
.partitionBy(partition_by)\
.mode(mode_)\
.save(file_path)

# Renaming the column names before join in order to avoid ambigious column names after the join
new_column_names = ["AM_" + col_name for col_name in df.columns]
selected_df1 = selected_df1.select([col(col_name).alias(new_col_name) for col_name, new_col_name in zip(df.columns, new_column_names)])
new_column_names = ["DM_" + col_name for col_name in df.columns]
selected_df2 = selected_df2.select([col(col_name).alias(new_col_name) for col_name, new_col_name in zip(df.columns, new_column_names)])

# Doing a join operation to get a new data frame
join_df = selected_df2.join(selected_df1, [selected_df1.AM_Markt == selected_df2.DM_Markt, selected_df1.AM_Leveringsadres_Postcode == selected_df2.DM_Leveringsadres_Postcode\
, selected_df1.AM_Leveringsadres_Gemeente == selected_df2.DM_Leveringsadres_Gemeente, selected_df1.AM_Peildatum == selected_df2.DM_Peildatum],how='outer')

# Selecting the required columns after the join operation
# join_df = join_df.select('DM_Trekkingsdatum', 'DM_Peildatum', 'DM_Markt', 'DM_Leveringsadres_Postcode', 'DM_Leveringsadres_Gemeente'\
# , 'DM_WerkelijkVerbruik_RM_2017', 'DM_BenaderendVerbruik_VM_2017', 'DM_BenaderendVerbruik_VM_2017_Norm', 'DM_AantalToegangspunten_2017'\
# , 'AM_WerkelijkVerbruik_RM_2017', 'AM_BenaderendVerbruik_VM_2017', 'AM_BenaderendVerbruik_VM_2017_Norm', 'AM_AantalToegangspunten_2017'\
# , 'DM_WerkelijkVerbruik_RM_2018', 'DM_BenaderendVerbruik_VM_2018', 'DM_BenaderendVerbruik_VM_2018_Norm', 'DM_AantalToegangspunten_2018'\
# , 'AM_WerkelijkVerbruik_RM_2018', 'AM_BenaderendVerbruik_VM_2018', 'AM_BenaderendVerbruik_VM_2018_Norm', 'AM_AantalToegangspunten_2018'\
# , 'DM_WerkelijkVerbruik_RM_2019', 'DM_BenaderendVerbruik_VM_2019', 'DM_BenaderendVerbruik_VM_2019_Norm', 'DM_AantalToegangspunten_2019'\
# , 'AM_WerkelijkVerbruik_RM_2019', 'AM_BenaderendVerbruik_VM_2019', 'AM_BenaderendVerbruik_VM_2019_Norm', 'AM_AantalToegangspunten_2019'\
# , 'DM_WerkelijkVerbruik_RM_2020', 'DM_BenaderendVerbruik_VM_2020', 'DM_BenaderendVerbruik_VM_2020_Norm', 'DM_AantalToegangspunten_2020'\
# , 'AM_WerkelijkVerbruik_RM_2020', 'AM_BenaderendVerbruik_VM_2020', 'AM_BenaderendVerbruik_VM_2020_Norm', 'AM_AantalToegangspunten_2020'\
# , 'DM_WerkelijkVerbruik_RM_2021', 'DM_BenaderendVerbruik_VM_2021', 'DM_BenaderendVerbruik_VM_2021_Norm', 'DM_AantalToegangspunten_2021'\
# , 'AM_WerkelijkVerbruik_RM_2021', 'AM_BenaderendVerbruik_VM_2021', 'AM_BenaderendVerbruik_VM_2021_Norm', 'AM_AantalToegangspunten_2021'\
# , 'DM_Gemiddeld_WerkelijkVerbruik','DM_Gemiddeld_BenaderendVerbruik','DM_Gemiddeld_BenaderendVerbruik_Norm','DM_Total_AantalToegangspunten'\
# , 'AM_Gemiddeld_WerkelijkVerbruik','AM_Gemiddeld_BenaderendVerbruik','AM_Gemiddeld_BenaderendVerbruik_Norm','AM_Total_AantalToegangspunten'
# , 'DM_MeasurementType') #, 'DM_MeasurementYear', 'DM_MeasurementMonth'

# Printing the count of the join data frame
print(join_df.count())

# Displaying the top 5 rows
display(join_df.limit(5))

file_path = 'abfss://output@rawdevstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Electricity_Measurement_pyspark_join'
write_format="delta"
partition_by=["DM_Peildatum"]
mode_ = Mode #overwrite #append

join_df\
.write\
.option("header", "true")\
.option("overwriteSchema", "true")\
.format(write_format)\
.partitionBy(partition_by)\
.mode(mode_)\
.save(file_path)
